flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 260 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=260>>260.
If he does 64 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 260 = <<324-260=64>>64
He has to do 65 on Saturday because 64 + 1 = <<64+1=65>>65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 264, not 260. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
